examples: The night sky is black, except for the stars and the moon.
The company is finally in the black.
Each 180-litre container will hold up to three black bags of rubbish.
Each 180-litre container will hold up to three black bags of rubbish.
She prefers her coffee black, without any sugar or cream.
words.defineEn: having the color that is the darkest, like most crows
words.defineVi: có màu tối nhất, giống như hầu hết các loài quạ

examples: Blue blood is no guarantee of any particular merit, competence, or expertise.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
The ocean's blue color amazed us.
They wore blue jeans to the party.
The little boy's favorite toy was a blue car.
words.defineEn: having the color of the ocean or clear sky at daytime
words.defineVi: có màu sắc của đại dương hoặc bầu trời quang đãng vào ban ngày

examples: My cat's fur is brown.
My father has brown eyes.
Brown algae have complex life cycles with genetic diversity.
We used brown sugar as a key ingredient in our homemade barbecue sauce.
On the day of the wedding, Brown experienced cold feet.
words.defineEn: having the color of chocolate ice cream
words.defineVi: có màu của kem sô cô la

examples: The leaves on the trees are green.
The lights changed to green.
The color green has a restful effect.
The green frog hopped from one lily pad to another.
The vibrant green color of perilla leaves adds an attractive touch to any dish.
words.defineEn: having the color of fresh grass or most plant leaves
words.defineVi: có màu của cỏ tươi hoặc hầu hết các lá cây

examples: I'll take the grey jacket.
Try using your grey matter and you might find the answer.
The film presents a straightforward choice between good and evil, with no shades of grey.
It's hard to trust someone who has a history of deceit because a fox may grow grey, but never good.
People usually get grey hair in their thirties or forties.'
words.defineEn: having a color between white and black, like most koalas or dolphins
words.defineVi: có màu giữa trắng và đen, giống như hầu hết gấu túi hoặc cá heo

examples: My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.

Bitter orange peel is a great addition to my herbal remedies.

She has an orange cat.
words.defineEn: having the color of carrots or pumpkins
words.defineVi: có màu của cà rốt hoặc bí ngô

examples: Cripps pink apples add a pop of color and a sweet-tart taste to my fruit salad.

Thousands of factory workers have been given the pink slip in recent months.
Fast food chains removed pink slime from their menus to regain trust.
words.defineEn: having the color of strawberry ice cream
words.defineVi: có màu kem dâu tây

examples: Red wine leaves a stain.

The company has plunged $37 million into the red.
words.defineEn: having the color of tomatoes or blood

examples: The bride's wedding dress is white.

words.defineEn: having the color that is the lightest, like snow

words.defineEn: having the color of lemons or the sun
words.defineVi: có màu chanh hoặc mặt trời

examples: My father is quite old now
This thankless IT support job is really getting old.
This old house gives me the willies.
The old man gave up the ghost.
The old man considered his granddaughter thoughtfully.
words.defineEn: (of a thing) having been used or existing for a long period of time
words.defineVi: (của một thứ) đã được sử dụng hoặc tồn tại trong một thời gian dài

examples: The team's new manager brings ten years' experience to the job.

words.defineEn: recently built, invented, made, etc.
words.defineVi: được xây dựng, phát minh, chế tạo gần đây, v.v.

examples: Sales are growing fast.
Things certainly move fast in the blogosphere.
He takes bends much too fast.
The fast runner won the race by a wide margin.
He's going too fast.
words.defineEn: having a high speed when moving or doing something
words.defineVi: có tốc độ cao khi di chuyển hoặc làm gì đó

examples: The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.

examples: The purple flowers in the vase were beautiful.

words.defineVi: cực kỳ dễ chịu cho tâm trí hoặc các giác quan

words.defineEn: having stains, bacteria, marks, or dirt

examples: Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.

It's an easy exam.
words.defineEn: needing little skill or effort to do or understand
words.defineVi: cần ít kỹ năng hoặc nỗ lực để làm hoặc hiểu

examples: The separation from Julie was already difficult for Alex.

examples: Your car is waiting, sir.
Your reputation proceeds you sir.
Sir, the inhabitants have risen up in rebellion.
Sir, I believe you just drank your fill.

words.defineEn: used as a respectful or polite way of referring to or addressing a man

examples: Pardon me, are you finished, madam?

Brian will answer all your questions madam.
'Look, madam!'
'Yes, Madam,' replied Bitzer.

words.defineVi: một cách lịch sự để giải quyết hoặc đề cập đến một người phụ nữ

I couldn't believe it when I heard he'd bought a sports car, but then he has always been one to let his heart rule his head.
words.defineEn: a small, fast, and low car that has a powerful engine, usually seats two people, and often has a removable or foldable roof

words.defineEn: being as great, complete, and flawless as possible
words.defineVi: tuyệt vời, đầy đủ và hoàn hảo nhất có thể

examples: The museum has free admission on Fridays.

The museum curator collects antique artworks for the museum's collection.

The museum is a fascinating place to learn about history and art.
words.defineEn: a place where important cultural, artistic, historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public
words.defineVi: nơi lưu giữ và trưng bày các vật thể văn hóa, nghệ thuật, lịch sử hoặc khoa học quan trọng cho công chúng

examples: This store is famous for its bait and switch tactics.
